mapper.sql: pqc.id, pqc.pro_info_id,pi.name promoterPersonName,pqc.dest_id, pqc.shangjia_name, pqc.`map`, pqc.map_name, pqc.`floor`, pqc.x, pqc.y, pqc.fid, pqc.`type`,pqc.`desc`,pqc.qrcode,pqc.qrcodelocal,pqc.create_time,pqc.update_time
mapper.select:
select
from promoter_qr_code pqc left join promoter_info pi on pqc.pro_info_id = pi.id where pqc.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update promoter_qr_code
pro_info_id = #{proInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dest_id = #{destId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update promoter_qr_code set pro_info_id = #{proInfoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dest_id = #{destId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shangjia_name = #{shangjiaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `map` = #{map,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, map_name = #{mapName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `floor` = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, x = #{x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fid = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time=#{updateTime} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
